Key Match Events: Thunder surged into a 31-17 lead after the first quarter
Thunders poured in 39 points in the second quarter
Joe caught fire with eight three-pointers
Knicks were effectively forced into damage limitation mode
Pre-Game Insights: Oklahoma City were left licking their wounds after a defeat against the Cavaliers
The game was billed as a potential NBA Finals preview
Post-Match Reflections: Oklahoma City's win saw them stretch their lead to 31-6 at the top of the Western Conference standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks were never looked like catching up
The Thunder kept their foot on the pedal in the second quarter
